questions.question: Anyway, guys, is there something that you think about that threatens us in this century?
So in terms of how much stress it has on your body, is it biologically stressful?
What are some interesting differences between the parabolic plane and when you're actually going up in orbit?
What are some stupid little things or big things that are very difficult for human beings to go through?
And if I wanted to do a live performance, what kind of instruments would I need?
First of all, does that excite you, humans going to Mars, like stepping foot on Mars?
Do those get, do those get weird when you get past a certain number of humans?
So like loosely speaking, does it become affordable for like MIT type of research lab?
What do you think about how damn hard it is to get out of space?
What do you like, like inspires you every day in terms of its beauty, in terms of its awe?
What important idea do you believe is true that many others don't agree with you on?
Is there a single kind of driving purpose why or can it just be curiosity based?
